dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, December 04, 2005 5:17 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; baruch@blessedb.org
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property
Date: Sat, 3 Dec 2005 22:37:12 -0600
From: Baruch <baruch@blessedb.org>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello:

I am writing to you concerning this Web page:

http://www.best-ipod.info/fm-transmitter-ipod-shuffle.htm

It contains text that was written and copyrighted by Skye Thomas, of
TomorrowsEdge.com.  Ms. Thomas did not give permission for her material to
appear on this Website.  Moreover, the person who is using Ms. Thomas's
material is not presenting it for informational purposes.  He or she is
using it to serve as filler text, into which is placed the phrase "fm
transmitter ipod shuffle".  The apparent intent is to manipulate search
engine bots into giving this Web page a higher ranking than it would
otherwise have.

This is plagiarism.  It does not fall within the purview of "fair use".  It
is simply misuse of Ms. Thomas's work.  Please remove the text immediately.
There are plenty of texts in the public domain that could serve the same
purpose, without infringing on the rights of living authors.  Using this
text is unnecessary and illegal.

Thank you.

- -Baruch Ben-David



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDk3jlvK/XpJs6oyURAolAAJ0ckQK3aTTgsIZz6IFKji/Flx30JwCfbLNz
xMB0QTl153srToCSVsX4V3w=
=8XJu
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
